title: Cannot open https://www.tensorflow.org in Safari
body_html:
As subject says, always error msg saying "Safari cannot open the page, because it cannot open make the secure connection with the server". Has anybody encountered the problem and can you share your experience how to fix ?
Opening the website from Firefox is OK.
System: Mac 10.12.6.
